column4: I recreated my Xconf file, and that is the reason, i suspect, why my ubuntu doesn't load anymore. After the loading bar i get a screen with messed up pixels and it doesn't respond to anything. I tried going into recovery mode and finding the Xconf file and doing mv <backup> (what i thought was the backup) as suggested here, but it didn't help. Is there anything else I can do? I'm on a liveCD right now, is it possib
you tried using the vesa driver to see if it loads the desktop?
So i should try to use the recovery mode terminal to try and edit the Xconf file and change device to vesa?
